page.title: 08LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
My hobby is dancing. On a Friday I go{disco dancing}and on a Tuesday I go to{ballroom dancing. { On Sunday I go to play{squash.}It is a very tiring game because you have to run around a lot and you get very hot.
On Tuesdays I go to{Brownies.}We play games. Then we do work for badges. When we are enrolled we get a promise badge. We are the first Hartshorne pack with ten people in it.
I like riding my{BMX bike}and doing stunts on it. I can do wheelies and jumps.
My hobby is collecting toy{rabbits.} I have got about sixty. They are pink, green and all different colours.
